entries.entry: Recent engine changes to clipping caused datapoints to not be clipped properly when charts are placed in scroll boxes. This update fixes the problem, however there is a small decrease in performance. If this is more important, behaviour can be reverted by adding a [KantanCharts] section to DefaultGame.ini containing the entry: CustomPointDrawing=true

entry.title: Re-enabled iOS support in binary release

entries.entry: Added new optional limit for the number of datapoints in a Cartesian datasource. When the number of datapoints hits this limit, subsequent points will take the place of the oldest existing point, putting a cap on memory consumption. Only applies when using Advanced versions of Cartesian or Time Series plots with the KantanSimpleCartesianDatasource.
